__e: I don't do well with unanswered questions.
I am not good with people.
As you can see, I do just fine on my own.
Actually, I do all right for myself.
Have a girlfriend, have a home. I'm doing just fine, thank you.
I'm pretty good with ladies of the night.
But you weren't so lucky, were you?
well, i know my way around a computer, that's for sure.
And there's no coffee or cable. And I came here to be with you.
The cable is out-- it doesn't mean it's the end times.
There's a cord running under it, - and I think you may be on fire.
Well, you asked me to. You said that wire we stole was a part of you, and you wanted it implanted closest to your heart.
There is only one wire going to your house.
Would you walk with a safety line?
I hear you have difficulty with the warp drive.
Well, I thought it was a guide rope.
Look, guys, I really appreciate what you're doing, but I'm fine on my own.
It's okay, been on my own since I was fourteen.
You know what, Mike? I can handle this. Can you please just tell everybody to go home?
I don't need any family. I can take care of myself.
Wouldn't be the first time I've pulled myself up by the bootstraps in this town.
He can be late if he likes. I can manage without him, but he needn't expect me to help him anymore.
